page.title: 05SHOPS IN HATCH BEAUCHAMP
page.content: In Hatch Beauchamp there are three shops. One is an antique shop,another is a Post Office, which as well as stamps and stationery also sells all kinds of food,some games,toys, newspapers, magazines, ice creams and sweets. The other shop sells food and hardware. Their speciality is Scrumpy Cider, that is cider made in Somerset. There are two bakers' vans that call at houses in the village. They sell cakes, crisps, fruit and vegetables. They deliver every day except for Sundays and Bank Holidays. The shops are open all week except for Wednesday, Saturday and Sunday afternoons.
